awd_titl_txt: Computation of Thermo-Solid and Fluid Dynamical Systems
awd_abstract_narration: In this project, the investigator proposes to:                                                                                                                  1. Develop a protocol for computational mechanics                                  methodology which enhances solution accuracy with                               reasonable resource demand, that will be appropriate                            for the computation of thermo, solid and fluid                                  dynamical systems.                                                                                                                                           2. Integrate the protocols into one smooth solution                                algorithm.                                                                                                                                                   3. Apply this new protocol in the solution of the flow                             between rotating coaxial cylinders; and                                                                                                                      4. Investigate the potential generalization of the method                          to specific combinations of coupled thermo, solid and                           fluid dynamical problems.                                                                                                                                    Solving models that combine these three areas:  thermo,                         solid and fluid dynamics is a very critical problem in                          engineering technology.  Reasonably good computational                          protocols are available to handle the above systems                             independently, but hardly any efficient technique has yet                       been developed to integrate the simultaneous solution of                        the three problem types.
org_div_long_name: Div. of Equity for Excellence in STEM
